answers.answer: 27 weeks, 25 pounds. :)
27 lbs 27 weeks 2 days
15 pounds 25 weeks
26 weeks 6 days 15 pounds
26 weeks, 19 pounds. Doc thinks it's too much...

37 weeks and 30 lbs. My doctor told me I was overweight (which I am a smaller girl) and that my main goal should be to get the weight off asap after the baby is born. I couldn't believe it, I wanted to tell her what I thought of her. Lol.
35 weeks, 18lbs.my dr says that's too much.
33 weeks and 24lbs
38 pounds and 35 weeks..too much weight gain apparently
29Lbs and I'm 36 weeks. My dr says I'm on target.
I'm 36 weeks and have gained 30 pounds. My doctor said that I'm right one track
I'll be 36 weeks tomorrow and I've gained 43lbs but my doctor says that I look good and I'm properly proportioned.
Will be 36 weeks on Thursday and have gained 11lbs. Doctor isn't concerned. Says everything is great

Im 34 wks and have gained 16 pounds, dr says Im doing good he's not concerned. I started off overweight though so have been trying to exercise and eat well. Im hoping to not gain more than 20-22 lbs total.
34 weeks on Tuesday, 13 lbs. Started off a little overweight. Doc not concerned. Baby weighs 5lbs 2ozs according to 33 week ultrasound.

I gained twenty pounds and am at week 35.  Was complimented up until week 32. Now everyone is flipping out and ordering extra ultrasounds. ... whatever! !!  I dont think I did too bad.  I wasn't hungry until the third trimester.   Guess I put on a bit each time.  I have an ultrasound tomorrow and am excited! !!  :)  I have seen folks bigger than me.  I am eating lots of fruits and veggies and I only drink water.   I do love a little coffee.... and cookies though too.  My downfall!  A happy and healthy pregnancy for all of us! !!  I hear you Faye.  I wanted to  tell the first doctor to take the four reported pounds and..... lol.
I am 33.6 and I have gained 16.7 pounds. The doctor would like me to be at about 25 pounds but the baby is healthy.

I'm 36+5 and have gained 57 D:My Dr. Isn't concerned at all but I am. I don't over eat and I don't eat a lot of junk. My main thing my whole pregnancy has been 0% milk and honey nut cherrios. That's literally been all I have wanted besides yogurt. He said it's just some people's bodies. I'm 5"11 so it's spread out but I'm still not happy. I've had swelling and vision problems but he has yet to test me for preeclampsia, which is my concern. I've seen my charts show high blood pressure and not once has anything been said to me. Sorry....rant lol. But I consider you all lucky!
Wow you girls are lucky ! Before I got pregnant I was about 103 .. Tomorrow I will be 37 weeks and now weigh about 156 !
I've gained 30 pounds and I'm 37 weeks. I will probably gain a couple more pounds before the baby is here

question: I've gained 25lbs so far I'm 30 weeks, but I think I'm extremely little. In measuring 28 weeks, how much weight have you gained
title: weight
